title: AED Game Character Voice - The Viking
description: Deep in the frozen wastes of the North, He arises. Seeking conquest and plunder The Viking seeks to sail his way into your next video game or movie trailer for conquest and glory!
longDescription:
Audio Demo


Artwork by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character - The Viking voice-over sound library provides you with more than 275+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences. 

The Viking's voice profile is deep, gritty and ready to lead his battle hardened warriors to war with a professional vocal performance. He is perfect for Nordic viking heroes, or evil barbarians or any in-game, non-player characters and any antagonist game characters in a Nordic or Medieval setting. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean a audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.

Features:

  • Vocal Profile: Deep, Rich, Nordic accented Male Voice
  • Perfect for NPC's like Viking raiders, Nordic Chieftains and film or movie based trailers.
  • Featuring 123 custom lines and 134 NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.
  • Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping, battle cries and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your Nordic Hero!
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • Royalty Free and YouTube friendly
  • Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 296  male voice-over audio files
  • 46.8 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format

Number of Audio Waves: 296

Number of Audio Cues: 296

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
